name: Nariphon
description: A huge plant creature resembling an ordinary tree, indistinguishable when motionless.
memorable: Can create vegetative clones that act as extensions of itself, manipulating the battlefield.
goals: Use its environment for ambush and attack through brute strength and cloning abilities.
relations: Can create clones resembling creatures it attacks.
environment: Found in forested areas where it can blend in with trees.
strengths: Immunities to bludgeoning, piercing, and poison damage, as well as condition immunities.
weaknesses: Low Dexterity and Intelligence limits its mobility and cognitive functions.
attacks: Makes four attacks with roots or thorns, dealing bludgeoning and piercing damage respectively and can grapple targets.
most_powerful_ability: Vegetative Clone ability allows it to control clones mimicking creatures it hits.
senses: Possesses tremorsense with a range of 120 feet, allowing it to detect movement nearby.
skills: Has a passive perception score of 17, indicating good awareness of its surroundings.
additional_information: Can drag grappled creatures underground with its Bury ability.
Each grappled target takes poison damage while restrained.
Indistinguishable from ordinary trees when motionless.
Clones can perceive and act as Nariphon does.
Nariphon can control up to six vegetative clones simultaneously.
test_queries: creature that creates clones in battle
huge plant monster that disguises as a tree
manipulative plant creature with grappling attacks
dangerous plant that uses vegetative clones
strong plant with tremorsense and poison immunity
